text: Hi everyone!
Today I'm gonna show you how to cook 5 of the 10 most popular dishes on Google Search in 2019
What a surprise!
The most popular dish on Google Search this year is Peach Tea
Let's try this super easy recipe to make this dish with me!
I'm sure you'll definitely like it at your first taste
The ingredents include canned peach and  tea bags
Today I use red tea because its taste suits perfectly with Peach tea
an orange,  some lemongrass to make lemongrass syrup and some mints for decoration
First, take half a peach and cut into small pieces
Add 3 tbsp syrup in the can and puree it
This will add some delicious flavor
To make lemongrass syrup, we need 1 cup of sugar
1 cup of water
Mix well under medium heat until sugar is dissolved
Add 1 pinch of salt to add more sweet flavor
Smash 5-10 stalks of lemongrass and cut into shorter lengths
When sugar is completely dissolved and the water is boiling
Add the lemongrass
Cover the saucepan and continue boiling for 1 minute before turning off the heat
Let the lemongrass soak in the saucepan, covered, until cool
And there you have super fragrant lemongrass syrup
Now we will brew the tea
For each tea bag, we need about 150ml boiling water
For each tea bag, we need about 150ml boiling water
Soak these tea bags about 3 minutes before remove them
Now all the ingredients are ready, let brew the tea!
Put 20ml lemongrass syrup in a cocktail shaker
20ml peach puree
125ml red tea
Cut an orange and peach into slices
and put them in a glass for decoration
Add some ice and shake well
Finally, pour the peach tea into the glass
Top with some mint and lemongrass
Your guests will immediately take many  photos with this dish when being served!
Spicy Pickled Chicken Feet is the third most popular dish on Google Search in 2019
You need 500g chicken feet
Remove the hoof, chop in half and score so it can absorb the brine
Rinse chicken feet with some cooking wine and salt to reduce the bad smell
Bring the chicken feet to a boil
Add some vinegar to completely remove the smell and some cinnamon or star anise  to add nice aroma
Bring to a boil and continue cooking for 2-3 minutes
Remove and transfer the chicken feet in a bowl of ice cold water
to keep its crunchy texture and prevent chicken feet from turning dark
Cut 7-8 kumquats into a half
finely slice 3 stalks of lemongrass
and some chilli
Roll 3 lime leaves and cut into fine threads
To make the fish sauce, you need 1 cup sugar
1 cup fish sauce, 1 cup vinegar and 1 cup water
Mix well under medium heat until sugar is dissolved
Remove from heat and leave to cool
Put all chicken feet in a large mixing bowl
Then, spread the lemongrass, chilli, shallot and lime leaves and kumquat
How colorful and yummy!
How colorful and yummy!
Pour the fish sauce  brine over
Leave for a few hours
Don't forget to invite your friends to enjoy with you
Vietnamese daikon pickle is the fifth most popular dish on Google in 2019
To make this dish, you need 1 kg white daikon
Remember to choose round-shaped and heavy ones for best texture
Peel  and cut into strips to the size of your baby finger
Peel the carrot and cut into strips
With another half, you can trim as flower shape or cut into slices
Toss with 2 tbsp of salt
and set aside for about 1 hour
You'll see much water released by the daikon
Wash carefully with cooling water
Then squeeze off the excess water
Spread them into into a tray or a rack and sundry for 1-2 days
In case it's not sunny, you can dry in the oven
Set temperature at about 120C in 2-3 hours
Set temperature at about 120C in 2-3 hours
Slightly open the oven door to release the steam and radish will become dry earlier
While waiting, let make the fish sauce
Mix well in a large pan under medium heat
until sugar is completely dissolved
Turn off the heat and let it cool
Radish will be dry after 3 hours like this
Arrange them into a jar
Add some chilli and garlic
Pour the fish sauce
Cover the jar and wait until 3 days before enjoy it
You can serve with 'Chung cake' and feel Tet holiday atmosphere
Kumquat tea is also one of the most popular dishes this year
Kumquat tea is also one of the most popular dishes this year
It's very easy to make
Similarly with Peach tea, you will need lemongrass syrup
some kumquats and tea
To make kumquat tea, add to cocktail shaker 40ml lemongrass syrup
125ml red tea
I love the scent of yellow lime
Squeeze 1/2 yellow lime
and some kumquat juice
Add some ice and shake it well!
Arrange some kumquat leaves for decoration and pour kumquat tea
Arrange some kumquat leaves for decoration and pour kumquat tea
It's so simple that everyone can make this beverage!
Finally, I'd like to share with you the recipe of Liver pate
which is also one of the most popular dishes in 2019. You will need
Boil the pork skin and dice
This will make all ingredients stick together
Cut pork liver and chicken liver into small pieces
and soak in 180ml milk
to release the toxic and the smell of liver
Put the pork fat, liver in a bowl
add some salt
Mix well and set aside in 15 minutes
Tear 5 slices of sandwich bread
and soak in 120ml milk
Then dice 2 shallots and 1/2 onions
Fry in a pan until it's soft
then add the pork fat and liver
Stir-fry in 15 minutes and leave to cool
Combine the mixture with sandwich bread soaked in milk and diced pork skin in a food processor and pulse away
Place in a box and steam for 2-3 hours till completly soft with good scent
Finally, pour melted butter on top and put it in a fridge
There you have delicious Liver pate
It's perfect to serve with hot sticky rice some pork bologna, quail eggs and chilli sauce
It's perfect to serve with hot sticky rice some pork bologna, quail eggs and chilli sauce
If you like these recipes, don't forget to click 'like'
and share with your friends, too
I wish you a new year with health and success
Goodbye and see you!
